author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/34193.
Added a unit test to avoid having to find post-facto that the `getPayloadData` script employed by the CondDB Browser is broken.

#### PR validation:

Tried to run the new uni test, which fails as reported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/34193#issuecomment-865016433.
The commands included in `CondCore/Utilities/test/test_getPayloadData.sh ` were successfully executed in `CMSSW_12_0_0_pre2`.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: add unit tests for getPayloadData.py
